changeSet.createView: SELECT DISTINCT ON (md.station_id, md.commodity_id) md.station_id, md.commodity_id, md.mean_price, md.buy_price, md.stock, md.stock_bracket, md.sell_price, md.demand, md.demand_bracket, md.status_flags, md.prohibited, md.timestamp FROM validated_market_datum_view md WHERE (md.station_id, md.timestamp) IN ( SELECT DISTINCT ON (md2.station_id) md2.station_id, md2.timestamp FROM validated_market_datum_view md2 ORDER BY md2.station_id, md2.timestamp DESC );
